title: Managing Your Money - What To Do In A Bear Market?
description: Join Reshma Kapadia, associate editor at Barron's, and Doug Ramsey, chief investment officer at Leuthold Group to put the bear market into context, discuss how to navigate the volatility and identify when to start turning bullish.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Join Reshma Kapadia, associate editor at Barron's, and Doug Ramsey, chief investment officer at Leuthold Group to put the bear market into context, discuss how to navigate the volatility and identify when to start turning bullish.
